name: CardValley
description:
Experience history as you never have before: as a farmer. Survive and prepare for the unexpected.

Play through each season of the year and engage in farming activities,

immerse yourself in history and deal with special events

and most importantly: Manage your ressources to survive winter!

Controls

Mouse - interact

Keyboard shortcuts - coming soon

The Team

This game is a submission for the course "Game Design and Development" by the team "Grüne Daumen Dudes" (Group 02).

The team members are:

martinbauer

gseb

SoftwareCreator

Tips and Tricks:

Each year you need to have enough food to survive winter. It is a good strategy to save up some food early and not expand too soon.

Houses and Sheep consume food so be careful what you buy.

Do not spend all of your food in the shop at once. Credit cards were not invented in the 19th century. Neither was the undo button.
